entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:09 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 03:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 92 %

Wind: SW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
